column4: hi, i am r trying to consifure my ps2 mouse but it is not working, i have no idea where to look or how to get it working
what kind of mouse?
its a generic ps2 mouse  i am helping someone configure it no idea what it is it has no brand on it
His old windows manual
Did you boot with it plugged in?
Does it work on another os?
yes
brbr
yes
Rumors spread by my wife
yes to both questions
Does it work running the live CD?
did not try it with live cd
Did it ever work?  Then after an update start having problems
Just throwing out some ideas..
justinstalled ubuntu 3 days ago, it has never worked
dont see anything in dmesg as being detected
A mouse should not be a problem... Have you looked at your /etc/x11/xorg.conf
yes looks normal
Trying the live CD might help find the problem... THere isnt a USB adapter to PS2 or anything else unusual is there?
ido se this when i plug and unplug the device [17180246.064000]  psmouse.c: TouchPad at isa0060/serio1/input0 - driver resynched.
and this [17180508.308000]  psmouse.c: TouchPad at isa0060/serio1/input0 lost sync at byte 1
I dont have an answer... Sorry..
